enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Issues relating to implementation of Protocol Article 2.3
sentences: The EU said discussion on the matter should not be held prior to the adoption of the draft COP/MOP decision on Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects).
JAPAN preferred to continue discussing the issue under the agenda item on other matters.
Chair Benrageb said he would conduct informal consultations.
